submission:
class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]:
        ans = n-1
        longestpath=[1 for i in range(n)]
        res=[]
        gone = set()
        for x,y in queries:
            #print('Q', x, y)
            length=y-x
            if length>longestpath[x] and x not in gone:
                #print('')
                ans-=length-longestpath[x]
                for i in range(x+longestpath[x],x+length):
                    if i in gone:
                        continue
                    #print(i)
                    gone.add(i)
                    ans+=longestpath[i]-1
                longestpath[x]=length
            res.append(ans)
        return res
